entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Blazor RC2 breaks <script src="foo.js"> type tag includes within body of .razor files #18065
  • WinUI only. Back-button drawn only for the very first NavigationPage to be set to Detail. #18064
  • Shell TitleView on iOS not occupying requested height #18060
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Labels with max lines and linebreakmode not working even with adding handler workaround #18059
    .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] After migration from net7.0-ios to net8.0-ios app crashes randomly in release mode with UseInterpreter="False" #18058
    .NET 8 GA
  • Valid CSS not parsed correctly, breaks app #18056
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Swipeviews with invoked properties crash the app in Release #18055
  • .NET MAUI MacCatalyst Menu Bar items count problem #18054
  • C# Hot reload not working for Android #18053
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] FlyoutPage Navigation broken in Android #18050
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.1.7762] TableView row click command does not fire #18047
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Desenvolvimento MAUI error #18044
  • Navigation page on iOS shows only blank page with images in the wrong positions #18042
  • [Android] WindowSoftInputModeAdjust not working anymore #18041
    .NET 8 GA
  • Result of "WidthRequest="{Binding Width, Source={x:Reference input}}" is different to each platforms #18039
    .NET 8 GA
  • Open & Close Window Within Statement Scope Not Updating Application.Current.Windows Property #18037
    Backlog
  • [iOS] ListView TextCell/ImageCell/EntryCell List broken on scrolling, hangs app. #18036
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Bug][Android]The IsEnable property of the Picker does not work #18035
    Backlog

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] Grid rows aren't same height on iOS #17125
    .NET 8 SR1
  • A11y_.NET Core_MAUI_Recipe Search_Keyboard : The Recipe Items are not able to access using keyboard. #15599
    .NET 8 GA
  • MAUI runtime way slower than Xamarin.Forms #11479
    Backlog
  • Failed to mount developer tools on iPhone - Visual Studio Code #18040

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] update AOT profile for .NET 8 GA #18061
    .NET 8 GA
  • Added orientation property to slider #18057
    do-not-merge, community ✨, .NET 9 Planning
  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #18048
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 GA
  • [X] connect the right method to the event handler #18043
    .NET 8 GA

Merged

  • Limit star expansion when measuring/arranging at constrained sizes #17880
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 8 SR1
  • Update .NET versions to be the latest public release on nuget.org #17961
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 SR1
  • Set Nullable=enable in Control Samples projects #18020
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Run template tests run in parallel to save 15min of run time #17672
    area/templates 📄
  • Enable <Nullable> in .NET MAUI project templates #18019
    area/templates 📄, .NET 8 GA

Updated

  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Make Entitlements in Templates for MacCatalyst more consistent between debug and release configs. #17986
    .NET 8 GA
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 8 SR2
  • [net8.0] Update packages for rtm #17980
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #17793
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 SR1
  • Add remapping extensions for core #17918
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Avoid issues creating a Borderless Entry with a custom Handler #17778
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 8 SR1
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 8.0.0-preview1.23067.2 to 8.0.0-preview1.23170.2 #18009
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR3
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, s/pr-needs-author-input, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • [Windows] Fix issue using Connectivity from a background thread #17903
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix ContentPage BackgroundImageSource not working #17789
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix wrong Layout from hidden CollectionView #17659
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 GA
  • [C] Lowest specificity for propagated values #17648
    s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 GA
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    s/pr-needs-author-input, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Keep textcolor on characterspacing #17926
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 GA
  • Improves performance on BindableProperty #17756
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Add border visual tests #17633
    s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 2 updates #17956
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 SR1
